creatures

Class AttackingPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • start.Player
      • creatures.AttackingPlayer

  • public class AttackingPlayer
extends Player
    The AttackingPlayer class holds the information regarding the attacking player's current horde, and the credits and points which have been spent and earned during an ongoing game session.

    Since the AttackingPlayer class is responsible for the horde of creatures, it is also responsible for making the appropriate calls to update and render them.
    Author:
    Alexander Beliaev
